name: Amazon Queens
description:
In order to play, click on a piece and then click on a highlighted square to move. Then, click another highlighted square to shoot a flaming arrow! These arrows make the tiles impassable and the first player to be unable to move loses! The game board is fully customizable. 

A one day build challenge! Thanks to @mew_the_pinkmin for the idea, and @xf8b for the github readme!

Read about the game: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Game_of_the_Amazons

My github: https://github.com/jojo2357

Made in QB64 on 9/14/2020.
